amendment.description: An amendment numbered 4 printed in Part A of House Report 118-108 to lower the threshold for designation as a "major rule" to $50 million.
amendment.purpose: Amendment sought to lower the threshold for designation as a "major rule" to $50 million.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Biggs amendment (A004) Failed by recorded vote: 211 - 223 (Roll no. 257).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A004) offered by Mr. Biggs.
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Biggs amendment (A004) Failed by recorded vote: 211 - 223 (Roll no. 257).
